class= [[Sindhughosh class submarine]] |Ship type= |Ship displacement= 2325 tons surfaced<br/>3076 tons dived |Ship length= {{convert|72.6|m|ft|abbr=on}} |Ship beam= {{convert|9.9|m|ft|abbr=on}} |Ship draught= {{convert|6.6|m|ft|abbr=on}} |Ship draft= |Ship propulsion= 2 x 3650 hp diesel-electric motors<br>1 x 5900 hp motor<br>2 x 204 hp auxiliary motors<br>1 x 130 hp economic speed motor |Ship {{convert|7|kn|km/h|abbr=on}}<br>Submerged:{{convert|400|mi|km}} at {{convert|3|kn|km/h}} |Ship endurance= Up to 45 days with a crew of 52 |Ship test depth= Operational Depth;{{convert|240|m|ft|abbr=on}}<br>Maximum Depth;{{convert|300|m|ft|abbr=on}} |Ship complement= 52 (incl. 13 Officers) |Ship sensors= |Ship EW= |Ship armament= [[Strela_3|9M36 Strela-3]] (SA-N-8) SAM launcher<br/>[[3M-54_Klub|Klub-S (3M-54E) ASCM]]<br/>[[53-65_torpedo|Type 53-65]] passive wake homing torpedo<br/>TEST 71/76 anti-submarine, active-passive homing torpedo<br/>24 DM-1 mines in lieu of torpedo tube |Ship notes= }} |} '''INS ''Sindhurakshak'' (S63)''' is a {{sclass|Sindhughosh|submarine|0}} diesel-electric [[submarine]] of the [[Indian Navy]].<ref name=in-sg>http://indiannavy.nic.in/sub_sindhughosh.htm</ref> In June 4,2010 the Indian Defence ministry and Zvezdochka shipyard signed a direct contract to the upgrade programme which worth $ 80 million and it includes a complete overhaul including the submarineâ€™s hull structures. In August 2010, INS Sindhurakshak arrived at Zvezdochka shipyard in Russia, for an overhaul and upgrade.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://en.rian.ru/mlitary_news/20100812/160176840.html |accessdate=2010-08-17 |title=Russia to modernize fifth Indian submarine | Defense | RIA Novosti }}</ref> INS Sindhurakshak is being retrofitted in Russia under Project 08773 in Zvezdochka shipyard, the submarine has been modernized and repaired and its sea trials started earlier in October 2012. The upgrade features will be improved electronic warfare systems,control systems, and integrated weapon control system. This modernization enables incorporation of new Russian missile system Club-S with 200-km cruise missile range, Indian sonar USHUS and radio communication systems CCS-MK.There is a possibility to incorporate the Indian built BrahMos Cruise missiles later. ==Gallery== <gallery> Image:INS_Sindhurakshak_(S63)-1edited.jpg|INS ''Sindhurakshak'' (S63) @ Portsmouth, UK, 2013 Image:INS_Sindhurakshak_(S63)-6edited.jpg|INS ''Sindhurakshak'' (S63) @ Portsmouth, UK, 2013 Image:INS_Sindhurakshak_(S63)-8edited.jpg|INS ''Sindhurakshak'' (S63) @ Portsmouth, UK, 2013 </gallery> ==References== <references/> <!-- non-breaking space to keep AWB drones from altering the space before the navbox--> {{Kilo class submarine}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Sindhurakshak (S63)}} [[Category:Sindhughosh-class submarines]] [[Category:Ships built in Russia]] [[Category:1997 ships]] [[Category:Active submarines of India]] {{submarine-stub}} {{India-mil-stub}}
